title: Bachelor of Science in Construction Management
description: Build your future with a B.S. in Construction Management degree and achieve your career and educational goals in the diverse construction business. Accredited by the American Council for Construction Education, our degree program is nationally recognized and one of the largest in the country. Students will learn the leadership and technical skills to effectively manage construction projects from start to finish through hands-on experience and professional engagement.
careers: Land Development, Project Management, General Contracting
